metadata.Title: CVE-2020-27672 on Ubuntu 23.04 (lunar) - medium
metadata.Description:
An issue was discovered in Xen through 4.14.x allowing x86 guest OS usersto cause a host OS denial of service, achieve data corruption, or possiblygain privileges by exploiting a race condition that leads to ause-after-free involving 2MiB and 1GiB superpages.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-27672` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libxencall1 - 4.11.4+57-g41a822c392-1
libxendevicemodel1 - 4.11.4+57-g41a822c392-1
libxenevtchn1 - 4.11.4+57-g41a822c392-1
libxenforeignmemory1 - 4.11.4+57-g41a822c392-1
libxengnttab1 - 4.11.4+57-g41a822c392-1
libxenhypfs1 - 4.11.4+57-g41a822c392-1
libxenmisc4.16 - 4.11.4+57-g41a822c392-1
libxenstore4 - 4.11.4+57-g41a822c392-1
libxentoolcore1 - 4.11.4+57-g41a822c392-1
libxentoollog1 - 4.11.4+57-g41a822c392-1
xen-hypervisor-4.16-amd64 - 4.11.4+57-g41a822c392-1
xen-hypervisor-4.16-arm64 - 4.11.4+57-g41a822c392-1
xen-hypervisor-4.16-armhf - 4.11.4+57-g41a822c392-1
xen-hypervisor-common - 4.11.4+57-g41a822c392-1
xen-system-amd64 - 4.11.4+57-g41a822c392-1
xen-system-arm64 - 4.11.4+57-g41a822c392-1
xen-system-armhf - 4.11.4+57-g41a822c392-1
xen-utils-4.16 - 4.11.4+57-g41a822c392-1
xen-utils-common - 4.11.4+57-g41a822c392-1
xenstore-utils - 4.11.4+57-g41a822c392-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: xen package in lunar, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.11.4+57-g41a822c392-1').
